Translations.Text: Ese ntubona ko twoherereje abahakanyi amashitani, kugira ngo abashishikarize kwigomeka
Bityo, ntugire ubwira (bwo gushaka ko bahanwa), kuko mu by’ukuri tubabarira iminsi ntarengwa
Umunsi tuzakoranya abatinya Allah, berekeza kwa(Allah) Nyirimpuhwe, bameze nk’abashyitsi b’imena
Tukanashorera inkozi z’ibibi tuziganisha mu muriro wa Jahanamu, zishwe n’inyota
Ntibazagira ubushobozi bwo kugira uwo bakorera ubuvugizi, uretse uzaba afite isezerano rya (Allah) Nyirimpuhwe (ryo gukora ubwo buvugizi)
Ibirere biba byenda gusandara, n’isi yenda gusatagurika, ndetse n’imisozi yenda kuranduka
Kubera kobavuze ko (Allah) Nyirimpuhwe afite umwana
Kandi bidakwiye ko (Allah) Nyirimpuhwe yagira umwana
Nta na kimwe mu biri mu birere no ku isi kizagera imbere ya (Allah) Nyirimpuhwe kitari umugaragu (uciye bugufi)
Mu by’ukuri, (Allah) arabazi neza kandi yanababaruriye nyabyo
Kandi ku munsi w’izuka, buri wese azamugana umwe umwe (nta muvugizi)
Mu by’ukuri abemeye bakanakora ibyiza, (Allah) Nyirimpuhwe azabahundagazaho urukundo rwe, (anabahe gukundwa n’abagaragu be)
Mu by’ukuri, (Qur’an) twarayoroheje tuyishyira mu rurimi rwawe (yewe Muhamadi) kugira ngo uyikoreshe ugeza inkuru nziza ku batinya Allah, ndetse unayikoreshe uburira abantu b’abahakanyi
Nonese ni ibisekuru bingahe twarimbuye mbere yabo! Ese hari n’umwe muri bo ukibona cyangwa ngo wumve akoma
